mapper.select: SELECT b.bord_id, b.user_id, b.board_title, b.board_contents, b.board_date, u.user_name FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.bord_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (bord_id, user_id, board_title, board_contents, board_date) VALUES ( CASE WHEN (SELECT MAX(bord_id) FROM board) IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('B', LPAD(CAST(SUBSTR((SELECT MAX(bord_id) FROM board), 2) AS NUMBER) + 1, 3, '0')) ELSE 'B025' END, #{user_Id}, #{board_Title}, #{board_Contents}, SYSDATE )
